column5: Hi all,  Woke up just before dawn this morning and decided to walk down to the lake to fish with a coffee. As I stepped out the thunder started to roll and the rain began diluting my coffee. I decided against standing out on the lake in a thunder storm, put my fishing gear back in the house and headed out to take a few pics to show the wife and kid who were still sound asleep.  Did not get to fish but watching the sun come up more than compensated.
Great pictures Simon, folks who sleep late miss the best part of the day.  The one with your pooch is excellent.
Good Morning Simon,  Wonderful pictures of the sunrise.  That one of "man's best friend" deserves to be on the cover of a Pet Calander.  Thanks for posting that.

I always find dawn landscapes much more scenic than dusk. Fish usually bite better then too
